Subject: Cards Mailing List update Date: Fri, 23 Apr 1993 21:51:19 GMT Distribution: usa Lines: 9
Just wanted to let all the people who e-mailed me about a possible Cardinals mailing list that I wasn't able to get the OK to host the list here so someone else will have to do it. :-(
Many thanks to Bob Netherton for his helpful info.
Dick Detweiler
